summary: An ordinance relating to, and specifying a plan or system of additions and betterments to, and extensions of, the existing municipal light and power plant and system; providing for an interconnection of the same with the municipal light and power plant and system of the City of Tacoma; declaring the estimated cost thereof, as near as may be; creating a special fund and transferring thereto the sum of Seventy-five Thousand Dollars ($75,000.00) by an appropriation from the surplus in the light fund, in order to defray the expense of the City of Seattle in respect to said interconnection; authorizing and directing the preparation of plans and specifications for, and the making of, said interconnection and authorizing and appropriating funds therefor.
